  4. Nvidia and AMD Stocks Jump on Reports That Trump Will Ease AI Chip Export Restrictions  Nasdaq
  5. Trump administration to rescind and replace Biden-era global AI chip export curbs  Reuters

item.title: Investors pull money out of US equity funds for a fourth straight week - Yahoo Finance
item.description:
1. Investors pull money out of US equity funds for a fourth straight week  Yahoo Finance
  2. U.S. stock market funds saw outflows for the fourth straight week  MarketWatch
  3. Investors fled to Europe and Japan after Trump's tariffs jolted U.S. markets, Bank of America says  CNBC
  4. Bank of America Says Investors Pulled $8,900,000,000 out of US Markets in One Week, Fleeing to Foreign Markets: Report  The Daily Hodl
  5. BofA’s Trading Chief Says Shift Out of US Is Still Marginal  Bloomberg.com
